name: Sapo OpenID Header
author: Antonio Campos

sections.description: This plugins had the needed code to the header of your blog, to detect your OpenID account at http://openid.sapo.pt. Configure your person name at the administration panel. Look at my blog source code and check the header (http://antoniocampos.no-ip.com).
sections.installation:
1. Upload the folder “SapoOpenID” to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to settings and insert your persona name (created at http://openid.sapo.pt)
